channel.title: Comments on: 10 Age of Empires 2 Tips and Tricks To Become Better
channel.description: Learn and Play Age Of Empires 2 Just Better

item.title: By: Byron
item.dc:creator: Byron
item.description: This is a really solid overview of the mental challenges that a game like aoe2 can play on you. The comments about improving your game versus your ELO is exactly where I've come to of late. Your ego wants you to be better but the reality is, you need to build your strategy, decision making and efficiency in many areas before you can move forward. When you've mastered enough of those your elo will naturally progress.
item.content:encoded: This is a really solid overview of the mental challenges that a game like aoe2 can play on you. The comments about improving your game versus your ELO is exactly where I’ve come to of late. Your ego wants you to be better but the reality is, you need to build your strategy, decision making and efficiency in many areas before you can move forward. When you’ve mastered enough of those your elo will naturally progress.
